title: Ep. 147: 18 for 2018
description:
Make a list of "18 for 2018," the challenge of in-laws who want to fill your empty closets with their clutter, and an instagram-related project. Get in touch: @gretchenrubin; @elizabethcraft; podcast@gretchenrubin.com; happiercast.com; 774-277-9336.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
